title: Madden ratings with Ben Haumiller of EA Sports (Football 07/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ben Haumiller of EA Sports to break down all the new Madden ratings, which were released this week, including some surprising quarterback ratings. Why is Andrew Luck higher than Carson Wentz? Is Tyrod Taylor/Baker Mayfield and Joe Flacco/Lamar Jackson being tied a little wink-wink situation? How did EA compensate for Lamar's Vick-like speed in the game? Could Joey Bosa be the next 99 overall player? Are the Jaguars the best defense in the game? Could the Browns be FUN to play with in Madden this year??? Can you play with Jay Cutler? All those questions answered plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
